info.title: My FHIR Server Capability Statement
info.description: 此 CapabilityStatement 定義了伺服端必須支援的 FHIR RESTful API 功能

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

get.summary: Return the server's capability statement

/Patient.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Patient
/Patient.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Patient

get.summary: Search all resources of type Patient based on a set of criteria

/Patient/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Patient
/Patient/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Patient

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/MedicationAdministration.summary: manage the collection of resources of type MedicationAdministration
/MedicationAdministration.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type MedicationAdministration

get.summary: Search all resources of type MedicationAdministration based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Return administrations of this medication code

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Return administrations with this external identifier

parameters.name: medication
parameters.description: Return administrations of this medication resource

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The identity of a patient to list administrations for

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Return administrations that share this encounter or episode of care

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Return administrations with this administration device identity

parameters.name: effective-time
parameters.description: Date administration happened (or did not happen)

parameters.name: performer
parameters.description: The identity of the individual who administered the medication

parameters.name: reason-not-given
parameters.description: Reasons for not administering the medication

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The identity of a request to list administrations from

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The identity of the individual or group to list administrations for

/MedicationAdministration/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type MedicationAdministration
/MedicationAdministration/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type MedicationAdministration

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
